title: Earthquakes that caused the most fatalities in the United States 1900 to 2016
summary: The Earthquakes that States in the most fatalities was States Prince_William_Sound_Alaska_(March_28_1964) , who made 2000 fatalities .
The most that States was Mona_Passage_(October_11_1918) , with just 28 fatalities .

In second place was States Aleutian_Islands_Alaska_(April_1_1946) with 165 fatalities ; third place went to States San_Francisco_California_(April_18_1906) with 2000 fatalities ; fourth place went to States Hebgen_Lake_Montana_(August_18_1959) with 28 fatalities and fifth place went to States Long_Beach_California_(March_11_1933) , who was 116 fatalities .
gold: This statistic shows the ten earthquakes in the United States that resulted in the most fatalities from 1900 to 2016 . Approximately 2,000 people were killed by the earthquake and resulting fires in San Francisco , California on April 18 , 1906 .
